text: tatha (yaad karo) jab moosa ne apanee jaati se kahaah tumane bachhade ko poojy banaakar apane oopar atyaachaar kiya hai, atah tum apane utpattikaar ke aage kshama yaachana karo, vo ye ki aapas mein ek-doosare[1] ko vadh karo. isee mein tumhaare utpattikaar ke sameep tumhaaree bhalaee hai. phir usane tumhaaree tauba sveekaar kar lee. vaastav mein, vah bada kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
